root.name: Snoopy vs. the Red Baron
root.description: In this game you play as peanuts character Snoopy, and fight against the evil Red Baron and his evil squadron's of fighter planes in full aerial combat using various powerups. In split screen mode you play as any one of the famous peanuts character and fight each other in dogfight mode. Each one ofÂ the characters has their own specially designed plane and specially designed weapons.
